response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's truly a game-changer and I believe it could significantly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price not only ensures a fair return for us but also leaves room for you to see substantial returns on your investment. Please let me know if this offer aligns with your expectations or if you need more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 14000}
